name: Critical Eye
description:
Increases affinity.

Lv 1 Affinity +5%

Lv 2 Affinity +10%

Lv 3 Affinity +15%

Lv 4 Affinity +20%

Lv 5 Affinity +25%

Lv 6 Affinity +30%

Lv 7 Affinity +40%

name: Handicraft
description:
Extends the weapon sharpness gauge. However, it will not increase the gauge past its maximum.

Lv 1 Weapon sharpness +10

Lv 2 Weapon sharpness +20

Lv 3 Weapon sharpness +30

Lv 4 Weapon sharpness +40

Lv 5 Weapon sharpness +50

name: Protective Polish
description:
Weapon sharpness does not decrease for a set time after sharpening.

Lv 1 Effect lasts 30 seconds.

Lv 2 Effect lasts 60 seconds.

Lv 3 Effect lasts 90 seconds.

name: Load Shells
description:
Improves reloading, and increases the gunlance's shell capacity and charge blade's phial capacity.

Lv 1 Increases ammo and coating reloading speed.

Lv 2 Gunlance loading capacity +1 Increases charge blade phials

name: Flinch Free
description:
Prevents knockbacks and other reactions to small damage.

Lv 1 Prevents knockbacks.

Lv 2 Prevents knockbacks. Tripping is reduced to a knockback instead.

Lv 3 Prevents knockbacks and tripping.

name: Critical Boost
description:
Increases the damage of critical hits.

Lv 1 Increases damage dealt by critical hits to 30%.

Lv 2 Increases damage dealt by critical hits to 35%.

Lv 3 Increases damage dealt by critical hits to 40%.

name: Agitator
description:
Increases attack power and affinity when large monsters become enraged.

Lv 1 Attack +4 and affinity +3% while active.

Lv 2 Attack +8 and affinity +5% while active.

Lv 3 Attack +12 and affinity +7% while active.

Lv 4 Attack +16 and affinity +10% while active.

Lv 5 Attack +20 and affinity +15% while active.

name: Mushroomancer
description:
Lets you digest mushrooms that would otherwise be inedible and gain their advantageous effects.

Lv 1 Lets you digest blue mushrooms and toadstools.

Lv 2 Additionally lets you digest nitroshrooms and parashrooms.

Lv 3 Additionally lets you digest mandragoras and exciteshrooms.

name: Guard
description:
Reduces knockbacks and stamina depletion when guarding.

Lv 1 Very slightly decreases the impact of attacks.

Lv 2 Slightly decreases the impact of attacks and reduces stamina depletion by 15%.

Lv 3 Decreases the impact of attacks and reduces stamina depletion by 15%.

Lv 4 Decreases the impact of attacks and reduces stamina depletion by 30%.

Lv 5 Greatly decreases the impact of attacks and reduces stamina depletion by 30%.

name: Stamina Thief
description:
Increases certain attacks' ability to exhaust monsters.

Lv 1 Exhaust power +20%

Lv 2 Exhaust power +30%

Lv 3 Exhaust power +40%

name: Weakness Exploit
description:
Increases the affinity of attacks that exploit a monster weak spot.

Lv 1 Attacks that hit weak spots have 15% increased affinity.

Lv 2 Attacks that hit weak spots have 30% increased affinity.

Lv 3 Attacks that hit weak spots have 50% increased affinity.

name: Peak Performance
description:
Increases attack when your health is full.

Lv 1 Attack +5 while active.

Lv 2 Attack +10 while active.

Lv 3 Attack +20 while active.

name: Mind's Eye
description:
Your attacks are deflected less and deal more damage to hard targets.

Lv 1 50% chance of your attacks not being deflected. (+10% damage to hard targets when activated).

Lv 2 100% chance of your attacks not being deflected. (+15% damage to hard targets when activated).

Lv 3 100% chance of your attacks not being deflected. (+30% damage to hard targets when activated).

name: Guard Up
description:
Allows you to guard against ordinarily unblockable attacks.

Lv 1 Reduces damage taken by 30%.

Lv 2 Reduces damage taken by 50%.

Lv 3 Reduces damage taken by 80%.

name: Fire Attack
description:
Increases fire element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)

Lv 1 Fire attack +2

Lv 2 Fire attack +3

Lv 3 Fire attack +5% Bonus: +4

Lv 4 Fire attack +10% Bonus: +4

Lv 5 Fire attack +20% Bonus: +4

name: Master's Touch
description:
Prevents your weapon from losing sharpness during critical hits.

Lv 1 Grants a 20% chance of no sharpness loss while active.

Lv 2 Grants a 40% chance of no sharpness loss while active.

Lv 3 Grants an 80% chance of no sharpness loss while active.

name: Resentment
description:
Increases attack when you have recoverable damage (the red portion of your health gauge).

Lv 1 Attack +5 while active.

Lv 2 Attack +10 while active.

Lv 3 Attack +15 while active.

Lv 4 Attack +20 while active.

Lv 5 Attack +25 while active.

name: Critical Element
description:
Increases elemental damage (fire, water, thunder, ice, dragon) when landing critical hits.

Lv 1 Grants elemental damage +5% while active.

Lv 2 Grants elemental damage +10% while active.

Lv 3 Grants elemental damage +15% while active.

name: Poison Attack
description:
Increases the rate of poison buildup. (Poison buildup has a maximum limit.)

Lv 1 Poison buildup +5% Bonus: +1

Lv 2 Poison buildup +10% Bonus: +2

Lv 3 Poison buildup +20% Bonus: +5

name: Water Attack
description:
Increases water element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)

Lv 1 Water attack +2

Lv 2 Water attack +3

Lv 3 Water attack +5% Bonus: +4

Lv 4 Water attack +10% Bonus: +4

Lv 5 Water attack +20% Bonus: +4

name: Razor Sharp
description:
Prevents your weapon from losing sharpness.

Lv 1 Activates 10% of the time.

Lv 2 Activates 25% of the time.

Lv 3 Activates 50% of the time.

name: Resuscitate
description:
Increases attack power when you are suffering from an abnormal status.

Lv 1 Attack +5 while active.

Lv 2 Attack +10 while active.

Lv 3 Attack +20 while active.

name: Ballistics
description:
Extends the range in which ammo and arrows have maximum power.

Lv 1 Slightly extends range.

Lv 2 Extends range.

Lv 3 Greatly extends range.

name: Paralysis Attack
description:
Increases the rate of paralysis buildup. (Paralysis buildup has a maximum limit.)

Lv 1 Paralysis buildup +5% Bonus: +1

Lv 2 Paralysis buildup +10% Bonus: +2

Lv 3 Paralysis buildup +20% Bonus: +5

name: Ice Attack
description:
Increases ice element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)

Lv 1 Ice attack +2

Lv 2 Ice attack +3

Lv 3 Ice attack +5% Bonus: +4

Lv 4 Ice attack +10% Bonus: +4

Lv 5 Ice attack +20% Bonus: +4

name: Spare Shot
description:
Bow and bowgun shots have a chance not to expend coatings or ammo.

Lv 1 Activates 3% of the time.

Lv 2 Activates 10% of the time.

Lv 3 Activates 20% of the time.

name: Coalescence
description: Temporarily enhances attacks after recovering from blights or abnormal status.

name: Critical Draw
description:
Increases affinity for a short time after performing a draw attack. (Does not include Silkbind attacks.)

Lv 1 Affinity +10%

Lv 2 Affinity +20%

Lv 3 Affinity +40%

name: Sleep Attack
description:
Increases the rate of sleep buildup. (Sleep buildup has a maximum limit.)

Lv 1 Sleep buildup +5% Bonus: +1

Lv 2 Sleep buildup +10% Bonus: +2

Lv 3 Sleep buildup +20% Bonus: +5

name: Thunder Attack
description:
Increases thunder element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)

Lv 1 Thunder attack +2

Lv 2 Thunder attack +3

Lv 3 Thunder attack +5% Bonus: +4

Lv 4 Thunder attack +10% Bonus: +4

Lv 5 Thunder attack +20% Bonus: +4

name: Normal/Rapid Up
description:
Increases the attack power of Normal Ammo and Rapid-type arrows.

Lv 1 Slightly increases the power of Normal Ammo and Rapid-type arrows.

Lv 2 Increases the power of Normal Ammo and Rapid-type arrows.

Lv 3 Greatly increases the power of Normal Ammo and Rapid-type arrows.

name: Latent Power
description:
Temporarily increases affinity and reduces stamina depletion when certain conditions are met.

Lv 1 While active, increases affinity by 10% and reduces stamina depletion by 30%.

Lv 2 While active, increases affinity by 20% and reduces stamina depletion by 30%.

Lv 3 While active, increases affinity by 30% and reduces stamina depletion by 50%.

Lv 4 While active, increases affinity by 40% and reduces stamina depletion by 50%.

Lv 5 While active, increases affinity by 50% and reduces stamina depletion by 50%.

name: Focus
description:
Increases the fill rate for weapons with gauges and the charge rate for weapons with charge attacks.

Lv 1 5% faster gauge fill rate and 5% faster charge times.

Lv 2 10% faster gauge fill rate and 10% faster charge times.

Lv 3 20% faster gauge fill rate and 15% faster charge times.

name: Blast Attack
description:
Increases the rate of blast buildup. (Blast buildup has a maximum limit.)

Lv 1 Blast buildup +5% Bonus: +1

Lv 2 Blast buildup +10% Bonus: +2

Lv 3 Blast buildup +20% Bonus: +5

name: Dragon Attack
description:
Increases dragon element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)

Lv 1 Dragon attack +2

Lv 2 Dragon attack +3

Lv 3 Dragon attack +5% Bonus: +4

Lv 4 Dragon attack +10% Bonus: +4

Lv 5 Dragon attack +20% Bonus: +4

name: Pierce Up
description:
Increases the attack power of Piercing Ammo and Piercing-type arrows.

Lv 1 Slightly increases the power of Piercing Ammo and Piercing-type arrows.

Lv 2 Increases the power of Piercing Ammo and Piercing-type arrows.

Lv 3 Greatly increases the power of Piercing Ammo and Piercing-type arrows.

name: Maximum Might
description:
Increases affinity if stamina is kept full for a period of time.

Lv 1 While active, increases affinity by 10%.

Lv 2 While active, increases affinity by 20%.

Lv 3 While active, increases affinity by 30%.

name: Power Prolonger
description:
Long swords, dual blades, insect glaives, switch axes, and charge blades stay powered up longer.

Lv 1 Slightly boosts the duration weapons are powered up.

Lv 2 Boosts the duration weapons are powered up.

Lv 3 Greatly boosts the duration weapons are powered up.

name: Marathon Runner
description:
Slows down stamina depletion for actions which continuously drain stamina (such as dashing).

Lv 1 Reduces continuous stamina depletion by 15%.

Lv 2 Reduces continuous stamina depletion by 30%.

Lv 3 Reduces continuous stamina depletion by 50%.

name: Affinity Sliding
description:
Sliding increases your affinity for a short time.

Lv 1 Enables skill use.

name: Spread Up
description:
Increases the attack power of Spread Ammo and Spread- type arrows

Lv 1 Slightly increases the power of Spread Ammo, Shrapnel Ammo, and Spread-type arrows.

Lv 2 Increases the power of Spread Ammo, Shrapnel Ammo, and Spread-type arrows.

Lv 3 Greatly increases the power of Spread Ammo, Shrapnel Ammo, and Spread-type arrows.

name: Good Luck
description:
Good chance of increased quest rewards. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)

Lv 1 Slightly increases luck.

Lv 2 Increases luck.

Lv 3 Greatly increases luck.

name: Offensive Guard
description:
Temporarily increases attack power after executing a perfectly-timed guard.

Lv 1 Attack +5% while active.

Lv 2 Attack +10% while active.

Lv 3 Attack +15% while active.

name: Constitution
description:
Reduces stamina depletion when evading, blocking, or doing certain other actions.

Lv 1 Reduces fixed stamina depletion by 10%.

Lv 2 Reduces fixed stamina depletion by 20%.

Lv 3 Reduces fixed stamina depletion by 30%.

Lv 4 Reduces fixed stamina depletion by 40%.

Lv 5 Reduces fixed stamina depletion by 50%.

name: Horn Maestro
description:
Increases overall performance speed and shockwave damage.

Lv 1 Activates skill effect.

name: Ammo Up
description:
Increases bowgun loading capacity. (There is a cap to loading capacity.)

Lv 1 Expands clip size for some ammo types.

Lv 2 Expands clip size for many ammo types.

Lv 3 Expands clip size for most ammo types.

name: Chain Crit
description: Continuously landing hits gradually increases attack and elemental attack. (The amount of increase depends on the weapon.)

name: Earplugs
description:
Grants protection from large monsters' roars.

Lv 1 Reduces the effects of weak monster roars.

Lv 2 Nullifies weak monster roars.

Lv 3 Nullifies weak monster roars and reduces the effects of strong monster roars.

Lv 4 Nullifies weak and strong monster roars.

Lv 5 Nullifies weak and strong monster roars. Reduces the effects of powerful monster roars.

name: Stamina Surge
description:
Speeds up stamina recovery.

Lv 1 Stamina recovery speed +10%

Lv 2 Stamina recovery speed +20%

Lv 3 Stamina recovery speed +40%

name: Defense Boost
description:
Increases defense. Resistances will also improve as the level increases.

Lv 1 Defense +5

Lv 2 Defense +10

Lv 3 Defense +5% Bonus: +10

Lv 4 Defense +5% Bonus: +20 All elemental resistances +3

Lv 5 Defense +8% Bonus: +20 All elemental resistances +3

Lv 6 Defense +8% Bonus: +35 All elemental resistances +5

Lv 7 Defense +10% Bonus: +35 All elemental resistances +5

name: Rapid Fire Up
description:
Improves light bowgun rapid fire.

Lv 1 Rapid fire damage +5%

Lv 2 Rapid fire damage +10%

Lv 3 Rapid fire damage +20%

name: Tune-Up
description: Increases the stats of custom mods attached to bowguns.

name: Heroics
description:
Increases attack power and defense when health drops to 35% or lower.

Lv 1 While active, increases defense by 50 points.

Lv 2 Attack +5% and defense +50 while active.

Lv 3 Attack +5% and defense +100 while active.

Lv 4 Attack +10% and defense +100 while active.

Lv 5 While active, attack power +30% and defense-increasing effects are negated.

name: Punishing Draw
description:
Adds a stun effect to draw attacks and slightly increases attack power. (Does not include Silkbind attacks.)

Lv 1 Draw attacks deal a small amount of stun damage and get attack +3.

Lv 2 Draw attacks deal a small amount of stun damage and get attack +5.

Lv 3 Draw attacks deal a small amount of stun damage and get attack +7.

name: Divine Blessing
description:
Has a predetermined chance of reducing the damage you take.

Lv 1 While active, reduces damage taken by 15%.

Lv 2 While active, reduces damage taken by 30%.

Lv 3 While active, reduces damage taken by 50%.

name: Attack Boost
description:
Increases attack power.

Lv 1 Attack +3

Lv 2 Attack +6

Lv 3 Attack +9

Lv 4 Attack +5% Bonus: +7

Lv 5 Attack +6% Bonus: +8

Lv 6 Attack +8% Bonus: +9

Lv 7 Attack +10% Bonus: +10

name: Rapid Morph
description:
Increases switch speed and power for switch axes and charge blades.

Lv 1 Speed +10%

Lv 2 Speed +20% Morph attack damage +10%

Lv 3 Speed +30% Morph attack damage +20%

name: Hellfire Cloak
description:
Grants hellfire resistance and confers explosive hellfire power to your attacks after fulfilling certain conditions.

Lv 1 Reduces damage from hellfire.

Lv 2 Increases damage from hellfire blasts.

Lv 3 Inflicts hellfireblight when monsters are enraged.

Lv 4 Effect persists for one minute after a monster's rage has subsided.

name: Quick Sheathe
description:
Speeds up weapon sheathing.

Lv 1 Slightly increases sheathing speed.

Lv 2 Moderately increases sheathing speed.

Lv 3 Greatly increases sheathing speed.

name: Recovery Up
description:
Increases the amount recovered when restoring health.

Lv 1 Slightly increases recovery.

Lv 2 Increases recovery.

Lv 3 Greatly increases recovery.

name: Artillery
description:
Strengthens explosive attacks like shells, Wyvern's Fire, charge blade phial attacks, and Sticky Ammo.

Lv 1 Increases power of each attack by 10% and reduces Wyvern's Fire cooldown by 15%.

Lv 2 Increases power of each attack by 20% and reduces Wyvern's Fire cooldown by 30%.

Lv 3 Increases power of each attack by 30% and reduces Wyvern's Fire cooldown by 50%.

name: Wirebug Whisperer
description:
Improves your handling of Wirebugs.

Lv 1 Extends the duration you can keep a Wirebug by 30%.

Lv 2 Also increases Wirefall recovery rate.

Lv 3 Also increases passive recovery rate while on the ground.

name: Slugger
description:
Makes it easier to stun monsters.

Lv 1 Stun power +20%

Lv 2 Stun power +30%

Lv 3 Stun power +40%

name: Recovery Speed
description:
Speeds healing of recoverable damage (the red portion of the health gauge).

Lv 1 Doubles the speed at which you heal recoverable damage.

Lv 2 Triples the speed at which you heal recoverable damage.

Lv 3 Quadruples the speed at which you heal recoverable damage.

name: Charge Master
description: When a charged attack hits a monster, the element and status buildup of the charged attack increases.

name: Special Ammo Boost
description:
Increases the power of bowgun special ammo and Dragon Piercer.

Lv 1 Increases power of bowgun special ammo and Dragon Piercer by 10%.

Lv 2 Increases power of bowgun special ammo and Dragon Piercer by 20%.

name: Windproof
description:
Grants protection against wind pressure.

Lv 1 Negates minor wind pressure.

Lv 2 Negates minor and major wind pressure.

Lv 3 Negates minor and major wind pressure and reduces the effects of dragon wind pressure.

name: Foray
description: Increases attack power and affinity when attacking a large monster affected by poison, paralysis, or an elemental blight.

name: Steadiness
description:
Suppresses the deviation of bowgun shots.

Lv 1 Deviation -1

Lv 2 Deviation -2

name: Blight Resistance
description:
Grants protection against all elemental blights.

Lv 1 Reduces the duration of all elemental blights by 50%.

Lv 2 Reduces the duration of all elemental blights by 75%.

Lv 3 Nullifies all elemental blights.

name: Grinder (S)
description: When recovering sharpness, grants a boost to sharpness properties based on the number of levels recovered.

name: Speed Eating
description:
Increases meat-eating and item-consumption speed.

Lv 1 Slightly increases eating speed.

Lv 2 Increases eating speed.

Lv 3 Greatly increases eating speed.

name: Poison Resistance
description:
Reduces damage while poisoned.

Lv 1 Reduces the number of times you take poison damage.

Lv 2 Greatly reduces the number of times you take poison damage.

Lv 3 Prevents poison and reduces venom.

name: Bladescale Hone
description: Dodge rolling to evade an attack with your weapon drawn will recover sharpness, refill bowgun ammo, or give Close-range Coatings a temporary boost.

name: Tremor Resistance
description:
Grants protection against ground tremors.

Lv 1 Nullifies minor ground tremors.

Lv 2 Nullifies minor ground tremors and reduces the effects of major ground tremors.

Lv 3 Nullifies minor and major ground tremors.

name: Paralysis Resistance
description:
Reduces the duration of paralysis.

Lv 1 Reduces the duration of paralysis by 30%.

Lv 2 Reduces the duration of paralysis by 60%.

Lv 3 Prevents paralysis.

name: Redirection
description: Perform a perfectly-timed Switch Skill Swap just as a monster attacks to reduce the damage and negate damage reactions.

name: Bubbly Dance
description:
Reduces bubbleblight and grants increased evasion when afflicted.

Lv 1 Reduces the effects of major bubbleblight.

Lv 2 Reduces major bubbleblight to minor bubbleblight and increases evasiveness while afflicted.

Lv 3 Also inflicts bubbleblight when performing consecutive evasive movement.

name: Sleep Resistance
description:
Reduces the duration of sleep.

Lv 1 Reduces the duration of sleep by 30%.

Lv 2 Reduces the duration of sleep by 60%.

Lv 3 Prevents sleep.

name: Evade Window
description:
Extends the invulnerability period when evading.

Lv 1 Very slightly increases invulnerability window.

Lv 2 Slightly increases invulnerability window.

Lv 3 Increases invulnerability window.

Lv 4 Greatly increases invulnerability window.

Lv 5 Massively increases invulnerability window.

name: Stun Resistance
description:
Reduces stun duration.

Lv 1 Reduces the duration of stun by 60%.

Lv 2 Reduces the duration of stun by 90%.

Lv 3 Prevents stun.

name: Evade Extender
description:
Increases evade distance.

Lv 1 Slightly extends evasion distance.

Lv 2 Extends evasion distance.

Lv 3 Greatly extends evasion distance.

name: Muck Resistance
description:
Reduces impairments to mobility while stuck in monster muck or deep snow.

Lv 1 Reduces limits on movement speed.

Lv 2 Negates limits to movement speed.

name: Partbreaker
description:
Makes it easier to break or sever parts of monsters.

Lv 1 Part damage +10%

Lv 2 Part damage +20%

Lv 3 Part damage +30%

name: Blast Resistance
description:
Grants protection against blastblight.

Lv 1 Delays blastblight and reduces blast damage.

Lv 2 Greatly delays blastblight and greatly reduces blast damage.

Lv 3 Prevents blastblight.

name: Wall Runner
description:
Reduces stamina consumption when running on walls.

Lv 1 Reduces stamina consumption by 25% while wall running.

Lv 2 Reduces stamina consumption by 50% while wall running.

Lv 3 Also temporarily increases attack power by wall running.

name: Speed Sharpening
description:
Speeds up weapon sharpening when using a whetstone.

Lv 1 Removes one cycle from the sharpening process.

Lv 2 Removes two cycles from the sharpening process.

Lv 3 Removes three cycles from the sharpening process.

name: Counterstrike
description:
Temporarily increases attack power after being knocked back.

Lv 1 Attack +10 after activation.

Lv 2 Attack +15 after activation.

Lv 3 Attack +25 after activation.

name: Item Prolonger
description:
Extends the duration of some item effects.

Lv 1 Item effect duration +10%

Lv 2 Item effect duration +25%

Lv 3 Item effect duration +50%

name: Defiance
description:
Increases defense when large monsters become enraged.

Level 1: While active, nullifles weak roars, wind pressure, and tremors.

Level 2: While active, nullifles weak roars, wind pressure, and tremors. Reduces all strong ones, def +5

Level 3: While active, nullifles weak and strong roars, wind pressure, and tremors, def +10

Level 4: While active, nullifles weak and strong roars, wind, and tremors, reduces powerful roars & d.wind, def +20

Level 5: While active, nullifles weak, strong and powerful  roars, wind & dragon wind, and tremors, del +30

name: Wide-Range
description:
Allows the effects of certain items to also affect nearby allies.

Lv 1 Items affect nearby allies with 33% of their efficacy.

Lv 2 Items affect nearby allies in a wider radius with 33% of their efficacy.

Lv 3 Items affect nearby allies in a wider radius with 66% of their efficacy.

Lv 4 Items affect nearby allies in a much wider radius with 66% of their efficacy.

Lv 5 Items affect nearby allies in a much wider radius with full efficacy.

name: Reload Speed
description:
Increases bowgun reloading and bow coating loading speed.

Lv 1 Bowgun speed +1. Improves bow handling.

Lv 2 Bowgun speed +2. Loads bow coating automatically.

Lv 3 Bowgun speed +3.

name: Free Meal
description:
Gives you a predetermined chance of consuming a food or drink item for free.

Lv 1 Activates 10% of the time.

Lv 2 Activates 25% of the time.

Lv 3 Activates 45% of the time.

name: Recoil Down
description:
Reduces recoil when firing bowgun ammo.

Lv 1 Recoil -1

Lv 2 Recoil -2

Lv 3 Recoil -3

name: Fortify
description:
Increases your attack and defense when you fall in battle. (Disabled for some quests. Can be activated twice.)

Lv 1 Increases attack by 10% and defense by 15% with each use.

name: Hunger Resistance
description:
Reduces maximum stamina depletion over time.

Lv 1 Extends the time until your stamina cap reduces by 50%.

Lv 2 Extends the time until your stamina cap reduces by 100%.

Lv 3 Prevents your stamina cap from decreasing.

name: Leap of Faith
description:
Allows you to do a dive-evade when facing towards large monsters, and extends the dive-evade distance.

Lv 1 Enables skill use.

name: Diversion
description:
Increases the attention drawn when attacking a monster.

Lv 1 Activates skill effect.

name: Master Mounter
description:
Improves your Wyvern Riding skills.

Lv 1 Makes filling the Riding Gauge easier and increases ease of parrying.

name: Spiribird's Call
description: Receive the effects of a random Spiribird at fixed intervals. (Certain quests only)

name: Wall Runner (Boost)
description: Wirebug Gauge recovers faster while wall running.
